articles.author: Compiled by Lynn Butler
articles.title: Dwaine Pretorius announces sudden Proteas retirement: 'It has been a blast'
articles.description: Proteas all-rounder Dwaine Pretorius has confirmed his retirement from international cricket with immediate effect.
articles.content:
• Proteas all-rounder Dwaine Pretorius has announced his unexpected retirement from international cricket.
  • The 33-year-old has played 30 T20Is, 27 ODIs and three Tests for the Proteas i… [+5369 chars]

articles.title: ‘Walking on eggshells’: Aussies slam Langer
articles.description: The Australian cricket team has shed more light on what led to Justin Langer’s departure as coach, revealing players were “walking on eggshells” around him.
articles.content:
The Australian cricket team has shed more light on what led to Justin Langer’s departure as coach, revealing players were “walking on eggshells” around him.
Cricket Australia and Langer mutually agr… [+4758 chars]

articles.author: Simon Smale
articles.title: Australia's lopsided summer of cricket, beating South Africa and West Indies, unlikely to be an outlier
articles.description: Australia's summer of cricket was dramatically lopsided, but looking at where both Australia and South Africa go next, there is a concern that mismatches will become the norm.
articles.content:
You'll be hard pushed to find anyone who will come away from the summer of cricket with much positivity.
Sure, Australia were excellent.
Steve Smith, Marnus Labuschagne, David Warner, Usman Khawaja… [+6227 chars]

articles.description: Penalty after the batsman pleaded guilty to not reporting corrupt approaches | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
